backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing the core backend actor with authorization, user profiles, tasks, lists, routines, payroll/earnings, and spending logic, defining all domain types and per-user state stored in maps.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report JSON with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Generated overview document summarizing frontend source files and their responsibilities for build and review purposes.
frontend/docs/task-toggle-audit.md: Technical audit explaining why task completion toggles are slow, identifying backend waits and full refetches, and recommending optimistic updates like routines.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base defining design tokens, OKLCH color variables, and full light/dark theme styling.
frontend/index.html: Application HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, icons, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, colors, orientation, and installable icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic network-first caching for core assets and offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up theme handling and renders TaskManager, toast notifications, and offline status.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Admin-only dialog showing a searchable, paginated user list with controls to promote or demote admins. Handles async actions, copy-to-clipboard for principals, and error states with toasts.
frontend/src/components/AuthBootstrapLoa: Full-screen loading indicator shown during authentication or bootstrap phases.
frontend/src/components/BottomNavigation: Mobile bottom navigation component handling plan mode switching, long-press gestures, animated menu actions, and access to task, list, and earnings features.
frontend/src/components/CreateListDialog: Modal dialog for creating a new custom list with controlled input, validation, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Modal dialog component for creating new tasks, collecting task details and submitting them to the parent handler.
frontend/src/components/CustomLists.tsx: Renders and manages user-defined task lists with drag-and-drop, reordering, task CRUD actions, and optional plan mode UI. Handles list deletion confirmation and task sorting within lists.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog form for editing an existing taskâ€™s properties such as title, description, list, priority flags, and completion status. Syncs local state with the selected task and submits updates via a callback.
frontend/src/components/EisenhowerMatrix: Displays tasks in an expandable Eisenhower Matrix with four quadrants, supporting drag-and-drop, reordering, and task actions. Includes visual quadrant styling and an optional switch to plan mode.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright information and an external link with branding icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, user profile/admin access, theme toggling, and date display. Integrates Internet Identity login/logout and admin dashboard access.
frontend/src/components/InsightsDialog.t: Dialog showing spending and balance insights with tabbed views and time-based filters, rendering charts via Recharts. Computes totals and balance status from spend records and monetary settings.
frontend/src/components/MonetarySettings: File content not provided; likely defines a dialog for configuring or viewing monetary settings.
frontend/src/components/MorningRoutine.t: React component for managing morning/evening routines with add, delete, complete, reorder, display mode toggle, and expand/collapse functionality, including long-press drag reordering and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Global overlay component that listens to browser online/offline events and displays a full-screen offline warning when the user loses internet connectivity.
frontend/src/components/PayrollHistoryDi: Dialog component that displays payroll history, allows submitting pending payroll entries, and supports inline editing of past payroll totals with API mutations and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Settings dialog for configuring monetary limits and earnings behavior, including sliders for budget allocation, enabling/disabling earnings, and validation with user prompts and toasts.
Dialog for tracking and planning spending with custom entries and presets, supporting quick adds, confirmations, preset CRUD, and spend deletion with category handling.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: Memoized task card component supporting desktop and mobile drag-and-drop, long-press edit mode, completion toggling, editing, and deletion within task lists.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Icon button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes with animated sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/components/TodayEarnsDialog: Dialog component that calculates and displays today's earned income based on completed tasks and morning/evening routines using monetary settings, and submits payroll. It also integrates payroll history viewing and handles submission feedback with toasts.
frontend/src/components/UnauthenticatedS: Landing screen shown to unauthenticated users with product highlights and a login button. Triggers Internet Identity login and shows loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/UniversalAddTask: Modal dialog for creating new tasks either in Eisenhower quadrants or custom lists, with form state, validation, and quadrant prediction logic. Supports pre-selected lists and resets state on open/close.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Initial profile setup form that collects the user's name and creates a basic user profile with earnings enabled. Uses a mutation hook and displays success or error toasts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, falling back to an anonymous actor when unauthenticated. Invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and status flags. Wraps Dfinity AuthClient setup, identity persistence, and exposes identity to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a large set of React Query hooks that wrap backend actor calls for user profiles, admin management, app mode, tasks, routines, and monetization, handling caching, mutations, and invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, base styles, and custom utility animations including drag states and streak visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Provides local React-friendly task and list types with stable localIds and helper functions to convert between backend and local representations.
frontend/src/lib/userTier.ts: Maps backend UserTier enum values to human-readable string labels with a safe default.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app and wires up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/TaskManager.tsx: Main authenticated application page orchestrating task management, routines, settings, dialogs, and identity state using many custom hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/dragPayload.ts: Utility for reliably serializing and deserializing drag-and-drop task payloads via DataTransfer with custom and fallback MIME types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helper functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and hash-based parameters with sessionStorage fallbacks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, content scanning, custom color tokens via CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the current project schema, version, and a comprehensive high-level summary of the Momentum PWA along with a structured list of existing features (authentication, actor setup, RBAC, admin tools, productivity and monetization systems) used for planning and tracking build state.
